title: style.css
content: @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro:300,600,700); @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans); body { background: #fff; margin:0; padding:0; /*font-family: 'Source Sans Pro', 'sans-serif';*/ font-family: 'PT Sans', sans-serif; font-size: 1.1em; color: #000; font-weight: 300; } * { margin:0; padding:0; } /** element defaults **/ table { width: 100%; text-align: left; } th, td { padding: 10px 10px; } th { color: #000; background: #ccc none repeat-x scroll left top; } td { border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc; } code, blockquote { display: block; border-left: 5px solid #222; padding: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; } code { background-color: #222; color:#ccc; border: none; font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; } blockquote { border-left: 5px solid #222; } blockquote p { font-style: italic; font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; margin: 0; color: #333; height: 1%; } p { line-height: 1.25em; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; } strong { font-weight: bold;} a { color: #407fbf; /*border-bottom: 1px solid;*/ text-decoration: underline; } a:hover { border-bottom-color: #336699; color: #336699; } a:focus { outline: none; } a.button { background: linear-gradient(#336677, #336699); // #2F65D0, #214791 background-color: #336688; //#2A5BBB color: #FFFFFF; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; padding: 10px 15px; border: 1px solid #214791; text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 #214791; border-radius: 0px; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; } a.button:hover { background:#336699; //#2A5BBB } a.button-reversed { background: linear-gradient(#333, #111); background-color: #222; text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 #000; color: #fff; border-color: #000; } a.button-reversed:hover { background: #111; } fieldset { display: block; border: none; border-top: 1px solid #ccc; } fieldset legend { font-weight: bold; font-size: 0.9em; padding-right: 10px; color: #333; } fieldset form { padding-top: 15px; } fieldset p label { float: left; width: 150px; } form input, form select, form textarea { padding: 5px; color: #333333; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-right:1px solid #ccc; border-bottom:1px solid #ccc; background-color:#fff; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 0.9em; } form input.formbutton { border: none; background: #214893; color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; padding: 6px 10px; font-size: 0.8em; letter-spacing: 1px; width: auto; overflow: visible; } form.searchform input { font-size: 0.9em; padding: 6px; } form.searchform p { margin: 5px 0; } span.required { color: #ff0000; } h1 { color: #336699; font-size: 2.5em; margin-bottom: 10px; } h2 { /*color: #666;*/ font-size: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0px; padding: 0 0 10px; margin: 0; } h3 { /*color: #333;*/ font-size: 1.9em; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 10px; letter-spacing: -1px; } h4 { /*color: #000;//#20468E;*/ font-size: 1.2em; text-transform: uppercase; padding-bottom: 10px; } h5 { padding-bottom: 10px; font-size: 1.1em; color: #999; } ul, ol { margin: 0 0 35px 35px; padding: 0; list-style: disc; } li { padding-bottom: 10px; } li ol, li ul { font-size: 1.0em; margin-bottom: 0; padding-top: 5px; } .width { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0 auto; } #container { background-color: #fff; width: auto; margin: 0 auto; } header { padding: 10px 0 10px; margin: 0 auto; //background: linear-gradient(#336699, #204060); background-color: #FFF; text-align: left; //background-image: url('../images/banner.jpg'); background-position: left; background-repeat: no-repeat; //max-width: 1100px // PJ } header h1 { margin: 0; float: left; } header h1 a, header h1 a:hover { color: #FFF; font-size: 1.4em; padding: 10px 5px; /*letter-spacing: -4px;*/ border-bottom: none; display: block; font-family: 'times', serif; } header h1 a strong { font-weight: normal; color: #336699; } nav { float: center;/*right;*/ } nav ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 10px 0 0 22px; text-align: left; } nav ul ul { margin: 0 10px; } nav ul li { display: block; float: left; padding: 0px 5px; } nav ul li li { padding: 0; } /*menu items (boxes)*/ nav ul li a { display: block; float: center; /*left*/ padding: 10px 10px; color: #264c73; font-size: 0.9em; margin: 0 5px; border-bottom: none; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0px; text-decoration: none; /*remove underline of text in top-level menu*/ } nav ul li a i { padding-right: 5px; } nav ul li li a { float: none; padding: 10px 5px; } /*nav ul li a:hover { on hover of unselected top-level entry color: magenta; text-decoration: none; }*/ nav ul li.selected a, nav ul li.selected a:hover, nav ul li.current a, nav ul li.current a:hover, nav ul li.currentpath a, nav ul li.currentpath a:hover { background: linear-gradient(#3973ac, #2d5986); /* bg of selected top-level entry*/ color: #fff; border-radius: 1px; } nav ul li.selected a:hover, nav ul li.current a:hover, nav ul li.currentpath a:hover { background-color: #3973ac !important; /* bg on hover of selected top-level entry, all sub-entries*/ background-image: none !important; } nav ul li a:hover, nav ul li.sfHover a { background: #3973ac; /* on hover of unselected top-level entry*/ color: #fff; border-radius: 1px; } nav ul li a.sf-with-ul:hover, nav ul li.sfHover a { /* bg when hovering unselected menu-entry with sub-entries*/ background-color: #3973ac; color: #fff; border-bottom-left-radius: 0px; border-bottom-right-radius: 0px; } nav ul li.sfHover ul a, nav ul ul { /*color of unselected sub-entries, when not hovered*/ background: #2d5986; color: #fff; border-top-right-radius: 1px; border-bottom-left-radius: 1px; border-bottom-right-radius: 1px; } nav ul li.sf-with-ul.selected ul a, nav ul li.selected ul, nav ul li.selected.sfHover a , nav ul li.sf-with-ul.current ul a, nav ul li.current ul, nav ul li.current.sfHover a , nav ul li.sf-with-ul.currentpath1 ul a, nav ul li.currentpath ul, nav ul li.currentpath.sfHover a { /*background: #2d5986;*/ color: #fff; } nav ul li.sf-with-ul.selected ul a:hover, nav ul li.selected.sfHover a:hover, nav ul li.sf-with-ul.current ul a:hover, nav ul li.current.sfHover a:hover, nav ul li.sf-with-ul.currentpath ul a:hover, nav ul li.currentpath.sfHover a:hover { /*background: #2d5986;*/ } nav ul li li a:hover, nav ul li.sfHover li a:hover { /*bg of sub-entries of unselected menu-entry when hovered*/ background-color: #3973ac; color: #fff; } /*** ESSENTIAL STYLES ***/ .sf-menu, .sf-menu * { list-style: none; } .sf-menu { line-height: 1.0; } .sf-menu ul { position: absolute; top: -999em; width: 200px; /* left offset of submenus need to match (see below) */ margin-top: 10px; padding-top: 0; } .sf-menu ul li { width: 100%; } .sf-menu li:hover { visibility: inherit; /* fixes IE7 'sticky bug' */ } .sf-menu li { float: left; position: relative; } .sf-menu a { display: block; position: relative; } .sf-menu li:hover ul, .sf-menu li.sfHover ul { left: 0; top: 26px; /* match top ul list item height */ z-index: 99; } ul.sf-menu li:hover li ul, ul.sf-menu li.sfHover li ul { top: -999em; } ul.sf-menu li li:hover ul, ul.sf-menu li li.sfHover ul { left: 200px; /* match ul width */ top: 0; } ul.sf-menu li li:hover li ul, ul.sf-menu li li.sfHover li ul { top: -999em; } ul.sf-menu li li li:hover ul, ul.sf-menu li li li.sfHover ul { left: 10em; /* match ul width */ top: 0; } /* intro */ div#intro { background-color: #FFF; background-image: url('../images/banner.jpg'); background-position: left; background-repeat: no-repeat; box-shadow: 2px 2px 10px #000; } div#intro .intro-content { padding: 15px 0;//55px 0; text-align: center; } div#intro div.intro-content-short { padding: 50px 0 40px 0px; text-align: left; } div#intro h2 { /*text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 #000;*/ font-family: "times",serif; font-size: 3em; } div#intro h2, div#intro p { color: #336699; font-weight: normal; } div#intro p { font-size: 1.3em; color: #336699; line-height: 1.3em; } a.button-slider { padding: 10px 15px; font-size: 0.8em; text-align: center; margin: 5px 10px 5px 0; } a.button-slider i { padding-right: 5px; } img { width: auto; height: auto; } #body { background: none; margin: 25px auto 0; padding: 0px; clear: both; } #content { float: left; padding: 0px 20px; } .two-column { width: 66%; } .three-column { width: 46%; margin: 0 2%; } .with-right-sidebar { margin-right: 2%; } .with-left-sidebar { margin-left: 2%; } article { padding: 10px 10px 20px 5px; line-height: 115%; } article .article-info { color: #c0c0c0; font-size: 0.9em; letter-spacing: -0.5px; padding: 0 0 10px 0; } article .article-info a { color: #c0c0c0; border-bottom-color: #c0c0c0; } .sidebar { margin-top: 10px; } .small-sidebar { width: 25%; } .big-sidebar { width: 30%; } .left-sidebar { float: left; } .right-sidebar { float: right; } .sidebar h4 { padding-bottom: 0; font-size: 1.4em; letter-spacing: -1px; padding: 6px 0; } .sidebar ul { margin: 0; padding: 0; list-style: none; } .sidebar ul li { margin-bottom: 20px; line-height: 1.9em; padding: 10px; } .sidebar ul li.bg { background-color: #f0f0f0; } .sidebar .bg h4 { color: #666; } .sidebar li ul { list-style: none outside none; margin: 0px; } .sidebar li ul li { display: block; border-top: none; padding: 7px 2px; margin: 0; line-height: 1.5em; font-size: 0.85em; } .sidebar li ul li ul { margin-top: 10px; } .sidebar li ul li li { font-size: 1.0em; padding-left: 15px; } .sidebar li ul li.text { border-bottom: none; } .sidebar li ul li a { border-bottom-color: #666; color: #666; } .sidebar li ul li a:hover { border-bottom-color: #2A5BBB; color: #2A5BBB; } .sidebar li ul li a.readmore { font-weight: bold; } .sidebar ul.blocklist { border-top: 1px solid #ddd; } .sidebar ul.blocklist li { padding: 0; } .sidebar ul.blocklist li a, .sidebar ul.blocklist li a:hover { border-bottom: 0; display: block; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 12px 10px; } .sidebar ul.blocklist li a.selected, .sidebar ul.blocklist li.current a { background: linear-gradient(#3973ac, #2d5986); background-color: #264c73; color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #214791; font-weight: bold; } .sidebar li ul.blocklist li li { font-size: 1.0em; } .sidebar li ul.blocklist ul { margin-top: 0; } .sidebar li ul.blocklist li li a, .sidebar li ul.blocklist li li a:hover { padding-left: 25px; } .sidebar ul.newslist li { padding: 20px 5px; border-bottom: 1px dashed #ddd; } .sidebar ul.newslist p { margin-bottom: 0; } .sidebar ul.newslist span.newslist-date { background-color: #224A98; border-bottom: 1px solid #214791; color: #fff; padding: 5px 10px; } .clear { clear: both; } footer { margin:20px auto 0; background: #FFF; /*background: linear-gradient(#ecf2f9, #FFF); border-top: 2px solid #eee; background-image: url('../images/banner.jpg'); background-position: left; background-repeat: no-repeat;*/ box-shadow: 2px 2px 8px #808080 } footer p { text-align: left; color: #204060; font-size: 0.9em; margin: 0; padding: 0; } footer p a { color: #204060; /*font-weight: bold;*/ } .footer-content { padding: 20px 25px 30px; } footer .footer-content ul { width: 50%; list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; float: left; } footer .footer-content li { padding: 5px 5px; } footer .footer-content li a, footer .footer-content h4 { } footer .footer-content li a { color: #204060; border-bottom-color:#204060; } footer .footer-content li { color: #204060; line-height: 1.5em; font-size: 0.95em; } footer .footer-content li a:hover { color: #6699cc; border-bottom-color:#6699cc; } footer .footer-content ul li ul { width: 100%; } footer .footer-content h4 { color: #204060; font-size: 1.6em; padding-bottom: 10px; } footer .footer-bottom { padding: 10px; text-align: center; background-color: #FFF; font-size: 0.75em } footer .footer-bottom p { text-align: center; } footer .footer-bottom p, footer .footer-bottom p a { color: #336699; border-bottom-color: #336699; } div.social-icons a { border-bottom: none; margin-right: 15px; } @media screen and (max-width: 740px) { body { font-size: 0.8em; } header { text-align: center; } header h1 { float: none; text-align: center;} header h1 a, header h1 a:hover { float: none; padding: 5px; } nav { float: none; } .sf-menu li:hover ul, .sf-menu li.sfHover ul { top: 23px; } div#container { width: auto; } footer .footer-content ul { margin-bottom: 15px; } footer .footer-content ul.endfooter { margin-bottom: 0px; } .width { width:auto; padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px; } #content, aside.sidebar { float: none; width: auto; } #content { padding: 10px; } footer .footer-content ul { width: auto; float: none; } } @media screen and (max-width: 540px) { body { font-size: 0.8em; } header { text-align: center; padding: 10px 0 5px; } header h1 a, header h1 a:hover { text-align: center; padding: 10px; font-size: 1.1em; } header h1, nav { float: none; } nav { height: auto; position: relative; } nav ul { margin: 0; } .sf-menu ul { position: relative; width: auto; display: block; margin-top: 0px; } nav ul ul { margin: 0px 10px 5px; border-top-right-radius: 0; } nav ul li { margin: 5px 0; padding: 0; float: none; } nav ul li a {background-color: #fff; border-radius: 1px; text-decoration: none; /*remove underline of text in top-level menu*/} nav ul li a, .sf-menu li { float: none; } nav ul li li { margin: 0; } div#intro .intro-content { padding: 20px 5px; } div#intro div.intro-content-short { padding: 20px 5px 10px; } div#body { margin-top: 10px; } .sf-menu li:hover ul, .sf-menu li.sfHover ul { top: 0; } }
